translations.translation: So that none may err against the scales,
that you may not transgress in the balance,
so that you would maintain justice.
In order that you may not corrupt the balance.
In order that you may not transgress the balance.
That you may not be inordinate in respect of the measure.
That ye exceed not the measure,
so that you should not transgress the measure.
That ye should not trespass in respect of the balance.
In order that ye may not transgress (due) balance.
In order that you may not transgress (due) balance.
So do not transgress in the balance.
That you not transgress within the balance.
[55:8] [declaring] that you should not contravene, that is to say, so that you may not do wrong, with regard to the balance, that [instrument] with which one weighs.
(That ye exceed not the measure) that you do not transgress or be unjust in measure,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { أَلاَّ تَطْغَوْاْ فِي ٱلْمِيزَانِ } معناه لا تَجوروا
 واالميزانُ: العَدلُ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وإنما رتبها على متقضى الحكمة والعدالة { أَلاَّ تَطْغَوْاْ } أي: لئلا تعتدوا وتتجاوزوا أيها المجبولون لمصلحة التكليف والعرفان، على مقتضى الوحي الإلهي المترتب على الحكمة البالغة المتقنة في الأرض { فِي ٱلْمِيزَانِ } [الرحمن: 8] الموضوع بمقتضاها، ألا وهي الشرع الشريف
